meanings: [명사] boast, big talk, [동사] boast, talk big, talk boastfully

vlive.korean: 그건 장담 못해요? You can't guarantee that? 듣기 View video ONG SEONG WU : 헬로옹
이거는 진짜 제가 장담할 수 있어요. I can assure you of this. 듣기 View video THE BOYZ : 🌹🥐⚾️🌹
vlive.english: I can assure you of this.

vlive.korean: [독방 원해요] 장담할게요! [I want a single room] I'm so sure. 듣기 View video Mnet : [ONE DREAM.TXT] Reality Ep.02 - Part.1
vlive.english: [I want a single room] I'm so sure.

vlive.korean: 스케일 장담할 수 있어요 - 진짜요? I can guarantee the scale. - Really? 듣기 View video Stray Kids : [선데이키즈] TMI 대잔치
vlive.english: I can guarantee the scale. - Really?

vlive.korean: 장담할 수 있어요! We can guarantee it! 듣기 View video V PICK! : [THE BOYZ] 우리 큐랑둥 루돌큐 생일 축하해❣️ (Happy Q day+1)

examples.korean: Unemployment seems to be rising, despite repeated assurances to the contrary. 듣기 Add to Wordbook 그렇지 않다는 거듭된 장담들에도 불구하고 실업이 계속 증가하고 있는 것 같다. Oxford Advanced Learner's English-Korean Dictionary
examples.english: Unemployment seems to be rising, despite repeated assurances to the contrary. Add to Wordbook

examples.korean: She’s got balls, I’ll say that for her. 듣기 Add to Wordbook 그녀는 배짱이 있어. 내 장담하지. Oxford Advanced Learner's English-Korean Dictionary
examples.english: She’s got balls, I’ll say that for her. Add to Wordbook

examples.korean: She’s perfectly safe, I can assure you. 듣기 Add to Wordbook 그녀는 전적으로 안전해. 내가 장담할 수 있어. Oxford Advanced Learner's English-Korean Dictionary
examples.english: She’s perfectly safe, I can assure you. Add to Wordbook

examples.korean: ‘He’ll come back,’ Susan assured her. 듣기 Add to Wordbook “그는 돌아올 거야.” 수잔이 그녀에게 장담했다. Oxford Advanced Learner's English-Korean Dictionary
examples.english: ‘He’ll come back,’ Susan assured her. Add to Wordbook

examples.korean: I agree, but I can’t answer for my colleagues. 듣기 Add to Wordbook 전 동의해요. 하지만 제 동료들에 대해서는 장담할 수 없어요. Oxford Advanced Learner's English-Korean Dictionary
examples.english: I agree, but I can’t answer for my colleagues. Add to Wordbook
